LearnSAT - Release Notes

Version 1.4.1 (08.05.2013)
  Deprecate the choice of learn mode ... sorry!
  Decorate the cut in the implication graph.
  Decorate mode for choosing color or black and white.

Version 1.4.0 (02.05.2013)
  Modify algorithm for computing dominators for cases where the cut is not from a decision node.
  Modify algorithm for clause learning by resolution to work backwards on list of partial assignments, not on the graph.
  Change display of resolution and uip, remove display option "literal".

Version 1.3.4 (29.04.2013)
  Add clause number to antecedent clause used in resolution.
  "default" can be included as the first in a list of display options.
  Removed "clear_order" in favor of "set_order(default)".
  Enable choice of learning clauses by dominators or resolution.
  Refactor: delete dominator.pro and move all of the clause learning to a new module cdcl.pro.

Version 1.3.3 (25.04.2013)
  Fixed mistake in "usage" display.
  Added "V=0" or "V=1" to display of unit propagation.
  Changed display of dominator assignments.
  Dominator option decorates current decision node, kappa and dominator node in the dot implication graph.
  List of assignments displayed without antecedents.
  Refactored to limit negation operator to dpll and auxpred.
  Tutorial is now a separate document, distributed separately with its own version number.

Version 1.3.2 (08.04.2013)
  Display antecedent nodes in the assignment tree.
  Fixed bug in display of assignment tree.
  Added display option tree_inc.

Version 1.3.1 (27.03.2013)
  User can specify the order in which variables are assigned.

Version 1.3.0 (22.03.2013)
  Serious bug fixed: decision assignments not made in fixed order.
  Generate dot graphs of assignment tree.
  Code refactoring and cleanup.

Version 1.2.0 (12.09.2012)
  Computation of a learned clause by locating a dominator.
  Grid pebbling example added.
  Significantly expanded documentation.

Version 1.1.0 (02.09.2012)
  Significant improvements in software structure and explanations of the algorithms.

Version 1.0.0 (17.04.2012)
  Initial release.
